0.text: Bug 113730  Wrong relationship between cascading parameters.

1.text: 1.Create a datasource(sample), create a dataset(select * from  CLASSICMODELS.ORDERS).

2.text: 2.Create a cascading parameter,the parent parameter is ORDERNUMBER, the child  parameter is ORDERDATE.

3.text: 3.Pull the two parameters to the layout to preview.

4.text: Click parameter dialog to  change the values of the parameter, when change the parent parameter, the child  parameter will not change to the corresponding value, while keep the last  selected value.
